Method.name: POST
Method.description: Change ownership of a VM from one account to another. This API is available for Basic zones with security groups and Advanced zones with guest networks. Method.description: This command allows a user to register for the developer API, returning a secret key and an API key. This request is made through the integration API port, so it is a privileged command and must be made on behalf of a user. It is up to the implementer just how the username and password are entered, and then how that translates to an integration API request. Both secret key and API key should be returned to the user
